title.rendered: Accelerate Your Agency in 2021 – Quick Takes from Industry Experts

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”custom-header”][vc_column]

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1623446304748{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

The Revenue Growth Platform

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1626802596024{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background: #1e1e1f url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AAS_Hero_Chip_R2.jpg?id=202332) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525274666229{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Accelerate Your Agency
in 2021

14 Quick Takes from Industry Experts

[vc_text_separator title=”Deep-dive Q&A” title_align=”separator_align_left” color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#84c340″ el_class=”speakers-divider hidden” css=”.vc_custom_1608053721131{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1608055661461{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”hidden”]

14 Quick Takes from Industry Experts

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Don't neglect your own agency while you're focusing on clients.

[vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

While you’re busy being a hero for everyone else, make sure you don’t neglect your own growth. To help you accelerate your agency in 2021, we’ve gathered all the best advice shared by the 14 marketing industry experts featured in our Agency Acceleration Series.

If you’re ready to push your revenue into high gear, start with these tips from marketing and agency pros like Seth Godin, Ann Handley, Rand Fishkin, Shama Hyder and many more.

[/vc_column_text]

Hosts

Seth Godin

Author, Entrepreneur, Teacher

Seth Godin is an entrepreneur, best-selling author, speaker, and most importantly – a teacher. In addition to having one of the most popular blogs in the world, he has written 19 best-selling books and founded two companies, Squidoo and Yoyodyne (acquired by Yahoo!). He focuses on everything from effective marketing and leadership to the spread of ideas and changing everything.

Rick Carlson

CEO/Founder, SharpSpring

Rick is founder and CEO of SharpSpring. He started with the goal of bringing marketing analytics and automation tools to small and medium businesses on an affordable and easy-to-use SaaS platform. Rick has more than 15 years of executive management experience in the technology sector, holding president, CEO, general manager, and board positions at several successful Internet security companies.

[vc_raw_html el_class=”hidden”][/vc_raw_html]

[vc_row el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1607710056016{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent”][vc_raw_html el_class=”a-b-test-original”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sticky-mobile-button”][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
